Notes: Lambda transition reflecting changes in twinning and grain size.
Endmember for both Plagioclase and Alkali-Feldspar series. Lambda transition between low/high Albite.
Part of Apatite Solid Solution: Ca5(P04)3(F,Cl,OH)
Lambda transition between alpha/beta Cristobalite (aka, low/high).
Lambda transition describing antiferromagnetic transition from low to high.
Lambda transition describes ferri-magnetic (low) to paramagnetic transition (high).
Lambda transition between alpha/beta Quartz (aka, low/high). Member of polymorph group Quartz/Cristobalite/Tridymite.
Lambda transition between low/high Tridymite (aka, alpha/beta).
